quote: This is a wonderful day. I have never see this one before
Nothing can be changed until it is faced.
There is nothing holding you back in life more than yourself.
Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
Believe you can and you are halfway there
No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted
Do the best you can until you know better. Then when you know better, do better.
I have chosen to be happy because it is good for my health.
A winner is a dreamer who never gives up
The Future depends on what you do Today
The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud
I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work
I never lose. I either win or I learn
your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change
You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough
The Future belongs to those who believe in their dreams
However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at. It matters that you don't give up
What we know matters, but who we are matters more
